readInCSV

Class ReadManifestCSV

  • java.lang.Object
    • readInCSV.ReadManifestCSV

  • public class ReadManifestCSV
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads in a manifest CSV and updates the items quantity in stock and reduces the capital. If an exception occurs during the item update process the changes to the stores stock will be undone before it throws a message to the user.
    Author:
    Jacob Lyons (N9507175)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReadManifestCSV(java.lang.String fileNameAndPath)
      This method reads the manifest CSV and writes the item name and quantity brought to separate array lists.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void undoItemQuantityChanges(int index, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      This method undoes the changes made to the stores stock if an exception occurs in the updateInventory method.
      void updateInventory()
      This method updates brought items quantity and the stores capital, using the data read into the array lists.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadManifestCSV

        public ReadManifestCSV(java.lang.String fileNameAndPath)
                throws CSVFormatException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       StockException
        This method reads the manifest CSV and writes the item name and quantity brought to separate array lists. The method also checks if the CSV has the correct number of fields and contains the correct information.
        Parameters:
        fileNameAndPath - -file name and path of the manifest CSV
        Throws:
        CSVFormatException
        java.io.IOException
        StockException

    • Method Detail

      • updateInventory

        public void updateInventory()
                     throws StockException
        This method updates brought items quantity and the stores capital, using the data read into the array lists.
        Throws:
        StockException

      • undoItemQuantityChanges

        public void undoItemQuantityChanges(int index,
                                    java.lang.String errorMessage)
                             throws StockException
        This method undoes the changes made to the stores stock if an exception occurs in the updateInventory method.
        Parameters:
        index - -the index of the array list witch exception occurred
        Throws:
        StockException
